remarks: Theorem 19.2 of [Margaris] p. 89 with restricted quantifiers (compare ~ 19.2 ).  The restricted version is valid only when the domain of quantification is inhabited.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 5-Aug-2018.)
statement:
r19.2m $p |- ( ( E. x x e. A /\ A. x e. A ph ) -> E. x e. A ph ) $.
$d A x $.
